name: Tokyo Shadow
overview: Tokyo Shadow (東京シャドウ) is an adventure game for the Sega Saturn. Tokyo Shadow is an adventure game only released in Japan for the PLaystation and Saturn consoles that is based on a novel by Aya Nishitan who has write the Digital Devil Story novels. Through the streets of a modern Tokyo takes place this horror detective adventure game. In the town of Shibuya Hedei is killed by a demon when he was going on a date with his girlfriend and becomes a ghost, after that he can travel between the spiritual world and the real world defeating the demons that are around the town and finally destroy the demon Meggido. The player can go around the town to find clues, and finding the demons to advance in the game. Depending of the player choices the game features different endings. The third cd features the game cast, a picture gallery and a making off video.
